build.beforeBuildCommand: npm run build && node src-tauri/prepare-resources.js Release

bundle.shortDescription: Network traffic interception tool designed for TLS/SSL inspection, analysis, and manipulation
bundle.longDescription: InterceptSuite is a powerful network traffic interception tool designed for TLS/SSL inspection, analysis, and manipulation at the network level. Unlike tools like Burp Suite or OWASP ZAP that focus specifically on HTTP/HTTPS traffic, InterceptSuite aims to provide visibility into any TLS-encrypted protocol, operating at the TCP/TLS layer.
